title: 怎么禁止指令/minecraft:me
author: abc340998968
txt_content: RT，总是有玩家用这个爆粗，扰乱服务器秩序

replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp builder -minecraft.command.me
或者直接使用此插件禁止这个指令
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-460893-1-1.html
联系我QQ460657701 帮你解决 备注MCBBS求助 记得给我奖赏就好咯~~~~

replies.author: Joket_abc
replies.txt_content:
abc340998968 发表于 2016-7-11 09:55
没用啊 禁止的是/me 不是/minecraft:me
mangaddp 组 -bukkit.command.me

replies.author: abc340998968
replies.txt_content:
小小马 发表于 2016-7-11 09:34
mangaddp builder -essentials.me
没用啊 禁止的是/me 不是/minecraft:me
